properties.comment: This configuration provides locale-dependent names for labels in a (graphical) user interface.
properties.entry: Apply;Persistently saves the current configuration but keeps the dialog open.
Cancel;Closes this dialog without saving, i.e., all preferences will get lost.
Defaults;Restores the default configuration, i.e., all current preferences will be replaced by the default values.
OK;Saves the current configuration and closes this dialog.
